data.actual_result: The message isn't in codeblocks. If you try the other way round, the message is in codeblocks.
data.expected_result: The whole message should be in codeblocks (with one backtick).
data.short_description: Messages with 2 backticks in the start and 3 backticks in the end don't show in codeblocks.(whereas 3 in the start and 2 in the end show in codeblocks)
data.steps_to_repro: - Type a message with the above format.
